vista.set
Class DataReferenceVectorMathProxy

java.lang.Object
  vista.set.DataReference
      vista.set.DataReferenceVectorMathProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Named
public class DataReferenceVectorMathProxy
extends DataReference

A proxy for vector math operations on data references. This proxy is formed by vector math operations on data references. This can be thought of as a reference to a math operation on those data references. Only when the data for this reference is requested does it attempt to retrieve the data from its data references and perform the operation.

Version:
$Id: DataReferenceVectorMathProxy.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:20 redwood Exp $

Nicky Sandhu
